markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 3"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Venomous Cure Fulu](/Equipment.aspx?ID=986)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Fulu" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=378" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Necromancy" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=117" />
<trait label="Talisman" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=155" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 161 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 10 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** affixed to armor

</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Free Action" /><row>envision</row></row>

 

**Trigger** You attempt a saving throw against an injected [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126).

 
</row>

</column>

---

This green fulu depicts venomous creatures and vermin. When activated, the venom from the fulu fights against the venom in your system, granting you a +2 status bonus to the triggering saving throw.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Venomous Cure Fulu
